title: 90/491/EEC: Council Decision of 27 July 1990 concerning the conclusion of the Protocol for the Accession of Tunisia to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 27 July 1990
concerning the conclusion of the Protocol for the Accession of Tunisia to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade
(90/491/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Protocol for the Accession of Tunisia to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade is hereby approved on behalf of the European Economic Community.
The text of the Protocol is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to sign the Protocol in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1990.
For the Council
The President
E. RUBBI
